name: Der Weichensteller: Odyssey Live
summary: The internet is puzzled by a mysterious phenomenon: Posts are suddenly reappearing on the Instagram accounts of three deceased individuals. The only common denominator: all three died in accidents. The videos are cryptic, and no one can make sense of them. Therefore, the family of the deceased Wilson is asking for your help to get to the bottom of this case. In this murder mystery, you take on the role of Consulting Detectives Falkenberg.
